Text:
WOW absolutely LOVE the fact that someone is actually uploading criterions releases and some of the newer ones too on PB! cant thank u enuf SteelerJ17 please keeep them coming ! 
might i also make a request The Small Black Room Criterion DVD-R? and any of the following: DVD-5's of criterion release : 
622 Weekend (2011)
624 Quadrophenia 1979
626 Les visiteurs du soir 1942
627 The Game 1997 David Fincher
628 The Forgiveness of Blood 2011
629 Sunday Bloody Sunday 1978
@famemon78  I'll see what I can do for you. Please bookmark me on your computer cause you'll never know what I will upload.

SteelerJ17, thanks a lot! 

Amazing to get Criterion releases on ISO file...

Can you give a list of your Criterion belongings, so that we can ask for some titles? THE SMALL BACK ROOM, by any chance?
@danjaq You can e-mail me your lists to jplut08@yahoo.com. Also I'm looking for Hard Boiled and Robocop with full menus/features iso.
@danjaq The following Criterion's that I have The Rock, Being John Malkovich, Spartacus, Shallow Grave and Armageddon. I can always get Criterion's through my local library.

sounds brilliant Steeler :) ya i got u bookmarked now :) .. Small Black Room definitely seems like a hard one to get a hold of.  In the meantime perhaps some tv shows if its a possibility ? Iv been waiting FOREVER to try and grab an up of How I Met Your Mother Season 7 and One Tree Hill Season 8 from somewhere the only ones missing out of my collection. Would be much obliged if u went thru the trouble of upping any or both of those !
@famemon78 Thank you for bookmarking me. As for uploading tv series. It's going to be too much for me. Movies are much easier. Please understand.
@danjaq I looked up The Small Back Room. I could not find it on DVD or Blu-Ray
Thanks so much for this. Could we please have some more seeders?
